more.about:
Hơn 15 năm tạo dựng và phát triển chuỗi nhà hàng phục vụ Gà rán Kentucky tại Việt Nam theo tiêu chuẩn quốc tế của tập đoàn Yum! International, KFC Việt Nam đang phát triển không ngừng, tiếp tục chinh phục các thị trường tiềm năng trên khắp các tỉnh, thành của cả nước. Kế hoạch phát triển đến năm 2015, KFC Việt Nam sẽ đạt con số 200 nhà hàng trong khắp cả nước. Bên cạnh đó,chúng tôi sẽ mang đến hơn 7000 việc làm và cơ hội đào tạo cho người dân Việt Nam.

 

Những thành công của KFC Việt nam có được hôm nay, được tạo dựng nhờ vào đội ngũ nhân viên trẻ trung, năng động đang sống và làm việc hết mình với văn hoá “How We Win Together” nhằm hướng đến mục tiêu xây dựng KFC Việt Nam trở thành một Công ty có môi trường làm việc tuyệt vời.
more.whyworkus:
WORK LIFE BALANCE
Having a job that allows you the flexibility to enjoy the things that life has to offer is a definite tick in the box. At KFC we work to live. We endeavour to make your working life just as worthwhile as life outside work. You can be yourself and enjoy a supportive culture that promotes camaraderie.

 

DISCOUNTS
As a KFC employee you’ll be entitled to a discount on products. You’ll receive a staff discount card detailing the discounts you can enjoy when you join the team.

 

SERVICE RECOGNITION
From the day you join us, we recognise every day you spend with us. The rewards vary from badges to acknowledge your years of service to framed certificates and special gifts to show we appreciate the significant milestones you’ve reached.

 

EDUCATION ASSISTANCE
For those employees wanting to embark on tertiary education, KFC may contribute towards your education and textbook fees. Full-time employees and in some cases, part-time members of the Restaurant Management team, are currently eligible for this assistance.
